item.title: Coinbase to Integrate SegWit by February - Coinjournal
item.description:
Coinbase, the worldâ€™s largest cryptocurrency brokerage, wallet, and exchange which also operates GDAX, the Global Digital Asset Exchange, has officially announced that it will complete the integration of Segregated Witness (SegWit) in the coming weeks. Our engineering team has begun the final testing phase of SegWit for Bitcoin on Coinbase. SegWit compatible Bitcoin sends/receives will […]

This post Coinbase to Integrate SegWit by February first appeared on Coinjournal.
item.dc:creator: Coinjournal
